definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: The bitmaps I'll refer to in this tutorial are Windows bitmap graphics files.
sentences.chinese: 我將在本課中涉及的就是位圖文件。

sentences.english: The Bitmap file image style was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了位圖圖像文件的基本格式。

sentences.english: The pixmap representation of the animated objects is transmitted and displayed on the receiver side.
sentences.chinese: 這種表示直接傳輸動畫的位圖表示並在接收端顯示。

sentences.english: 16-bit file support and palettes were added to this version as well.
sentences.chinese: 這一版本還加入了16位圖支持和調色板。

sentences.english: The bufferDepth property sets or returns the bit depth of the color palette in the off-screen bitmap buffer.
sentences.chinese: 設置或獲取用於畫面外位圖緩衝顏色的每像素位數。

sentences.english: Key technology and method to display serial processed DIB image is presented.
sentences.chinese: 着重敘述DIB位圖連貫顯示的技術要點和實現方法。

sentences.english: You can also export images as bitmap files.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還可以以位圖文件導出圖片。

sentences.english: Shade selected bitmap(s) simulating distant light source.
sentences.chinese: 模擬遠光源使位圖陰影化。

sentences.english: Add bitmap images to a menu.
sentences.chinese: 把位圖圖象加到菜單裏。

sentences.english: NOTSRCERASE Inverts the result of combining the destination and source bitmaps using the Boolean OR operator.
sentences.chinese: 反轉使用布爾OR操作符合並源和目標位圖的結果。

sentences.english: Tiles this bitmap as the desktop background.
sentences.chinese: 將該位圖作爲桌面背景平鋪顯示。

sentences.english: Specifies the number of color planes in the bitmap.
sentences.chinese: 指定位圖中的彩色位面數。

sentences.english: Zip- Position chart and palette source code zip, Visual.

sentences.chinese: 循環所選位圖的顏色表。

sentences.english: Displays bitmaps that have transparent or semitransparent pixels.
sentences.chinese: 顯示包含透明或半透明像素的位圖。

sentences.english: This is not a valid bitmap file, or its format is not currently supported.
sentences.chinese: 無效的位圖文件，或者當前尚不支持這種文件格式。
